name: Afraid of the dark (jennisimone)
description:
This is a small & simple game made for Brackeys Game  Jam 2022.2 with the theme "You're Not Alone".

Your parents have put you to bed, but you can't sleep with the lights on. Unfortunately every time you switch off the lights something happens.

Figure out a way to turn the lights off & stay safe.

Again this is a small game, there's no win screen or real goal. I would have liked to have added more puzzle elements but I didn't have a lot of time. But I might update this game in the future. 

Whilst this game was made for PC, as it's all click controls, it also works on mobile devices.

All art, music, and code were done by myself during the course of this Jam.

The two sound effects are both from Freesound.org, links below:

https://freesound.org/people/SplatFreeSound/sounds/413690/
https://freesound.org/people/JarredGibb/sounds/219499/
